name: Mutants Must Die!
description:
Mutants Must Die! - It's a dynamic shooter, in which you'll have to kill mutants. The character needs pass the main giant mutants each 3 levels.
In game you'll meet 7 different types of mutants and 4 types of weapons. Each level is passed through a specific teleport at the end of the map. In gameplay you'll need to collect ammo for your different guns and additional first-aid kits.ControlsWalking (A,W,S,D), Fast movement (Shift), Shooting (Left Mouse), Change weapon (1,2,3,4)
